title: <model_name>!SHOW_CONFUSION_MATRIX | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
Returns a table containing the number of instances of each combination of actual class and predicted class in models
where evaluation was enabled at instantiation. You can use this dataset to plot a confusion matrix. This method takes no
arguments. See Confusion Matrix in show_confusion_matrix.
The name of the dataset used for metrics calculation, currently EVAL.
The number of instances of the given combination of actual and predicted class.
